subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Max Hall threw for 192 yards and 3 touchdowns in the only bowl game he knows, leading No. 15 B.Y.U. past No. 16 Oregon State, in the Las Vegas Bowl on Tuesday night.
snippet: Max Hall threw for 192 yards and 3 touchdowns in the only bowl game he knows, leading No. 15 B.Y.U. past No. 16 Oregon State, in the Las Vegas Bowl on Tuesday night.
